title: tappaga nannu
sahitya:
tappaga nanu brOvavalE taDavu jEsiti viDuvanu


anupallavi

  tappulu jEsina patitulaneppuDu brOcinAvu nIvu


caraNam 1    appappa rAti garbhamuna-nAhAramu galuga jEsi 
kappanu brOcina vADani goppaga ninu neranammiti
    caraNam 2    evarEmiccinArU enta gUDaveTTinAvu 
sarva rakSaka nAtO delpu sagamaina nEnittu
    caraNam 3    avanijA ramaNa sarasija bhavanuta suguNAbharaNa 
bhuvana bhAra hAra raghuvara varakavi sadAshiva sannuta
